extendedInfo.description: This Free Live Wallpaper Features An Amazing Fire Tiger!The Tiger Burns with flames on a still background as he moves from left to right, sometimes coming close, sometimes going away. This Free Live Wallpaper features -Creative Focus, Pan, Zoom, and Movement features-OPEN GL Rendering-Small File Size-Settings Options, which include many many customizations. -Purchase Feature to remove all ads, Permission Uses, and Unlock Themes-NO BAR NOTIFICATIONS ADS-NO TEXT MESSAGE ADS-NO EMAIL ADS-Setting options includeSlide, Cube, Trippy Cube optionTransparency OptionSpeed SettingsPan SettingsZoom Settingsand More!Also included is a slide show version so you can use your phone as a display at your home or office!Simply open the application and follow the instructions.  Easy.Suports Samsung Galaxy S 3, Samsung Galaxy S 2, Samsung Galaxy Note, Samsung Galaxy Ace, HTC One X, HTC Sensation, HTC One S, HTC One V, Sony Xperia, Google Nexus 7, Motorola RAZR, Motorola Defy Plus and All others.Permissions are only for making sure only the best Ads are displayed for you.  All, of course, are not intrusive.PLEASE READ!------------Disclaimer: This is an advertisement supported application.Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!Keywords:  Flame, Hell, Hellfire, Ferocious, Bengal,
